definition: classifier for coins, rings, badges, pearls, sporting medals, rockets, satellites etc/tree trunk/whip/wooden peg, used as a gag for marching soldiers (old)
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
too numerous to mention individually or one by one
Yuan Mei (1716-1798), famous Qing poet and critic, one of Three great poets of the Qianlong era 乾嘉三大家
Mei Cheng (-c. 140 BC), Han dynasty poet
to choose officials by divination (archaic)/to practice divination without a definite question
drinking game where one has to guess the number of small objects in the other player's closed hand
with horses and soldiers gagged (idiom)/(of a marching army) in utter silence
Sima Xiangru is meticulous and Mei Gao is fast (idiom)/to each his good points

sentences.english: China was second with 32, four behind the United States.
sentences.chinese: 中國有32枚，比美國少4枚，排在第二位。

sentences.english: China was second with 32, four behind the United States.
sentences.chinese: 中國有32枚，比美國少4枚，排在第二位。

sentences.english: They can nest up to eight times in a season, producing up to 800 eggs.
sentences.chinese: 一季中，它們可以上岸8次，產卵多達800枚。

sentences.english: Each side will cut its arsenal to below 1,700.
sentences.chinese: 雙方均將其核彈頭數量減少到1，700枚以下。

sentences.english: On May 26, North Korea test-fired two more missiles.
He went on to win 12 medals in four Paralympic Games.
sentences.chinese: 此後，他先後參加了四屆殘奧會，贏得了12枚獎牌。

sentences.english: In the small box was the ring that he had given her twenty years before.
sentences.chinese: 那個小盒裏面是那枚他二十年前送給她的戒指。

sentences.english: But rarely has a country won more than 50 gold medals.
sentences.chinese: 但是歷史上金牌數超過50枚的國家非常少。

sentences.english: A owns the 2 coins, his net asset is 2 dollar.
sentences.chinese: 甲擁有2枚硬幣，他的淨資產是2元。

sentences.english: Britain was No. 2 with 42 gold and 102 overall.
sentences.chinese: 第二名是英國收穫42金共計102枚獎牌。

sentences.english: In its lifetime, a female ladybug will lay as many as 2, 000 eggs.
sentences.chinese: 在雌性瓢蟲的一生中將產下多達2000枚的卵。

sentences.english: Mei Cheng's Qifa is one of the representatives of the Hanfu.
sentences.chinese: 枚乘的《七發》是漢賦代表作之一。

sentences.english: I hope you picked up your coin?
sentences.chinese: 您該把您的那枚錢幣拾起來了吧？

sentences.english: Amidst great pomp and ceremony, it handed out some 302 gold and jade medals.
sentences.chinese: 在這場盛宴裏，頒發了302枚金玉獎牌。

sentences.english: About twenty or thirty of them a week were falling on London at present.
sentences.chinese: 目前，像這樣的火箭彈倫敦大約每週要捱上二三十枚。

sentences.english: The "Old Fish" finally gets rid of 11 bombs within 48 hours.
sentences.chinese: “老魚”最後在48小時內拆除了11枚炸彈。

definition: classifier for small spheres, pearls, corn grains, teeth, hearts, satellites etc
to shoot (a projectile)/to fire (a rocket)/to launch/to emit (a particle)/to discharge/emanation/emission
